org.opends.server.workflowelement

Class ObservableWorkflowElementState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.opends.server.workflowelement.ObservableWorkflowElement
        • org.opends.server.workflowelement.ObservableWorkflowElementState

  • public class ObservableWorkflowElementState
extends ObservableWorkflowElement
    This class implements an observable workflow element state. The observable workflow element state notifies observers when the state of the workflow element has changed. Typically, observers are notified when a workflow element is enabled or disabled.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ObservableWorkflowElementState(WorkflowElement<?> observedWorkflowElement)
      Creates an instance of an observable object for a given workflow element.
